actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide for the treatment of settlement agreement reached with the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation.
short_title: Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation Lease Settlements Act of 1992

summary.text: Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation Lease Settlements Act of 1992 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide for the treatment of certain settlement agreements reached with the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation as leases.

titles.title: Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation Lease Settlements Act of 1992
A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide for the treatment of settlement agreement reached with the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation.
